intro: Play as one of 10 pilots in this thrilling sequel to an arcade classic. Fly across the world and destroy the shadowy organization Fata Morgana!
description:
SONIC WINGS REUNION is a sequel to the arcade-style shooting game SONIC WINGS, also known as Aero Fighters in the West. The previous version was sold in 1998.

Choose from up to 10 characters and destroy the mysterious organization “Fata Morgana” that has progressed into the modern world. The scenario changes depending on the combination of characters.

Features

- Eight initial characters and hidden characters that can be unlocked under certain conditions.
- Eight stages (including bonus stages) in which players fight in cities and locations in the modern world.
- Giant futuristic weapons from the original game.
- Local cooperative play is supported. Conversation scenarios are changed by cooperative play.
The co-op scenarios can be enjoyed in single-player mode as well.

Three sound modes are available.
The original sound mode is composed by Sonic Wings series sound composer Soshi Hosoi.
In the Arrange Sound Mode, the music of previous titles is completely arranged by Japan's most renowned sound creator. The user can set the music to be played.
In Mao Mao mode, Mao Mao's song is played as background music.

In Training Mode, users can set the difficulty level, invincibility, barriers, etc. to best suit their training needs.
Leaderboards are supported.
